snippet.title: Escape from Frankenstein's Castle
snippet.description:
Escape from Frankenstein's Castle for PC: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/9050/escape-from-frankensteins-castle/index.html

Escape from Frankenstein's Castle for Mac: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/9051/mac/escape-from-frankensteins-castle/index.html

Injured in a car crash with her fiancé Horatio, Hannah wakes up alone and finds herself trapped in Dr. Frankenstein's castle. Horatio's missing. Help Hannah as she interacts with the castle's suspicious inhabitants, discovers clues about the doctor's master plan, and completes puzzles to find an Escape from Frankenstein's Castle. Dive into this Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game and save Hannah and Horatio!

  * Perplexing puzzles
  * Exciting adventure
  * Check out our Blog Walkthrough @ http://www.bigfishgames.com/blog/escape-from-frankensteins-castle-walkthrough/
  * Get the Strategy Guide @ http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/9052/escape-frankensteins-castle-strategy-guide/index.html
